inputs.selection_motivation: Core CPI is a primary driver of how inflation expectations translate into equity market performance; linking it to the aggregated US inflation‑and‑stock‑market impact node enables direct inference of equity sensitivity to core inflation.
inputs.candidate_motivation: Core CPI is driven by and tracks inflation dynamics, policy signals, currency moves, and commodity prices.
